sentences.translation: 赞美诗小步舞曲，作品.72：第三次夜祷。

sentences.sentence: His other works include motets and madrigals.
sentences.translation: 他的其它作品包括赞美诗和情歌。

sentences.sentence: This eventually led, in the thirteenth and fourteenth centuries, to the polyphonic motets in which different parts might also have differing rhythms.
sentences.translation: 这最终导致在第十三和第十四世纪的经文歌的和弦也可能在不同部分有着不同的节奏。
